website_summaries.verdict: Men will find these glasses fit larger heads, are sturdy, and provide clear vision. The modern style makes them a good choice.
pros: Users say they fit larger heads easily
The pack comes with a pair of sunglasses
cons: Some users found the earpieces prone to breaking with use

customer_reviews.title: My Wife calls them my "Old Man Eyes" - I call them genius!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. One by the bed, one in my backpack, a few on the desk. Comfortable and clear optics! I can see pixels on my iPhone! Tons of colors to match your mood or style of the day.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: look good, great price, all broken within a few months
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and clear, fit well, look good, great price. What's not to like? (That was my original review) Now all the frames have broken in the same place. Some in a week or two, some in a month and the last just today. Considering I've never taken these glasses away from my desk , as I use them for computer viewing only, it's not mishandling, it's a product design defect. Don't be lured by the low price. The frames will break in two at the lower right corner and the lenses will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sisti

customer_reviews.title: Disposable
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the cheap junk imported from China these glasses are essentially built to fail. The frames are horribly brittle plastic. I would say you get an average of about a month before the frames fail. I guess that why the sell them mostly in 5 packs. I figured the are so cheap, just keep buying them and tossing them as they break. I have purchased 3 5-packs in the last 18 months and my last pair just broke. Problem is that they usually fail at a very inconvenient time .. and I am feeling guilty about all the needless waste I am creating. So only buying metal frames.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Got to tell you guys I have had these since January 2016 and now the 4th of 5 pair has broken the frame top left. Stay away. Don't know what to tell you the lenses are fine, hinge points are fine, they fit great but since 4/5 of the frames are broken in the same exact spot I would say this is a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: JR Means

customer_reviews.title: Loved these so much for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Loved these so much for my husband! He loved having variety, and seriously, it was like an unexpected makeover! :) What was to be functional was actually very stylish. Great product at a great price. He says that they are very comfortable and very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Theisen

customer_reviews.title: Eyekepper's reading glasses review.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price. Decent pair of glasses for reading. Very study. A little short on the length and could be wider, but overall I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Manalus

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: As reading glasses go, these are fantastic! They are as sturdy as any of the leading brands that you might find at a department store or eyewear retailer. The lenses are crystal clear and don't seem to scratch easily when cleaned with a proper lens cloth. The spring-loaded hinges and screws are securely fastened and don't show any obvious signs of weakness. The fit is perfect (I have an average sized adult head with a hat size of 7.5). The color options are very fashionable and look great (the clear frames look really cool!). This is a very well made product and the price makes it an excellent value. I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Kona408

customer_reviews.title: Best reading glasses EVER and very beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glasses. Super comfy, Great value and they are very clear and crisp to see out of! I will be ordering more soon as I can! They fit well, and I get so many compliments on them. I love how they don't have those nose piece things that mess up your hair too! I'm telling you, these are the best I've found on Amazon!! They also provide great Customer service which I appreciate!! Thanks again!! Geo
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: self destructs
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the poster who said these would be great if they would quit falling apart. UPDATE: I have two pair that have now self-destructed just sitting on the desk. Both broke in the same place - the plastic frame too tight on the lens, apparently. Of course, they broke after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Strong and persistent odor (off-gassing)
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these glasses EXCEPT.... I can't remember another product I purchased smelling so strongly of off-gassing. These glasses smelled terrible when I received them. I'll say too that I'm not normally sensative to this problem. I even Googled the term to make sure "off-gassing" was correct. This is the first product that I have complained about. I searched to see how to accelerate the off-gassing so it goes away. Based on results, I put my glasses in a hot box in the sun for a while. It helped, not 100% though.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I finally reached an age where my near sight has started failing. I picked up some readers from the dollar store, and they were barely "OK". The optics were inconsistent across multiple pairs. I bought this 5 pack for a little bit more money and tossed the old ones. These are working great for me and I'm not getting eye fatigue. I've got a pair in the truck and in various spots around the house where I invariably need them. No more looking around for where I left them. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Torkko

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to recall all of the readers I've bought over the years as my eyesight changed so often, having originally used contacts for distance and these for reading and working at the computers. I recently had cataract surgery so......once again, my prescription changed. These are well made and are a good value for the price. I seem to have the obsessive need to have a pair situated at every conceivable place these would be used, so the 5 pack came in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to recall all of the readers I've bought over the years as my eyesight changed so often, having originally used contacts for distance and these for reading and working at the computers. I recently had cataract surgery so......once again, my prescription changed. These are well made and are a good value for the price. I seem to have the obsessive need to have a pair situated at every conceivable place these would be used, so the 5 pack came in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They look good, fit good, seem reasonably sturdy. I like the hinges. Excellent value for 5 glasses. Have only noticed a slight bit of distortion in one pair edge to edge when moving your head, but not noticeable when looking straight. And having one pair that is tinted for outdoor use is great.
customer_reviews.author: P.LAWLESS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm an optician and I can tell you with authority that these glasses are truly optical quality, making sharp images without any aberration. I was very happily surprised to learn that they come with spring hinges which are superb for durability; a much sought after frame. Buy these. You can only win. No kidding. They have one giant flaw: When they are close you cannot put very much weight on them. I leaned across a bed not knowing they were there and both arms, or temples, snapped off like nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Ross

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I am always loosing or breaking my reading glasses so get a pack like this for a cheap price is great. Granted they are not the same quality as $200.00 prescription glasses but they are fine for everyday reading use. After two weeks, I am still using my first set and they have not developed any scratches which is a plus as I do tend to just toss them on the end table. All in all, a good buy for the person who uses reading glasses, wants back up pairs and does not want to spend a ton of money. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Richard j Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: I can see
customer_reviews.text: I can read without glasses in certain light conditions. When I need a little help the +1.00 does well. Locally, glasses similar to these will cost 5-10 dollars. For myself these are a good bargain. They fit good and sit straight on my face. The lens are nice and clear with no noticeable defects. I like the sunglass one for working on a deck on the back of the house and when I take my friends to the Doctor and wait in the car playing games on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic is weak and breaks easily around hinge
customer_reviews.text: I only use my reading glasses when I'm on the computer and do not carry it around with me. So, basically, I just put the glasses on and off my face and always put it in a case when not in use. Minimal use so very little wear and tear. This is the third pair that broke around the hinge. The first two had the same problem, so, it is obviously a common quality issue. I was very careful with the second and third pairs since the first pair broke the same way, but even with being extra cautious, it still broke. Sad, because otherwise I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Primer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny 👓
customer_reviews.text: Ever want something in life to just work and not cost a fortune? Well, look no further. These glasses are what the doctor ordered. One of our family member’s very expensive prescription glasses broke. In lieu of theirs being repaired/replaced we temporarily used the frame side rails from one of these cheap glasses frames and they attached directly to theirs. Honestly, you can’t tell they’re not original. They’ll work until we can get to an eye doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great value on a disposable item.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. For $3 each my expectations were really low. These are better than $20 readers from a pharmacy. These reviews about quality or breakage crack me up. I bought the five pack. Put the sunglasses version in my car, three are still in the package, and I’ve been wearing the same pair about a month. Got my moneys worth on the first pair already. If they break now who cares? At this rate the five pack should last me a year or more. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Clear

customer_reviews.title: Durable, relieves eye strain
customer_reviews.text: I'm slowly going farsighted but I also work a desk job. These glasses help tremendously when reading or using a computer, or doing other tasks that require focusing up close; I'm able to focus and my eyes and head don't hurt at the end of the day. They're simple and sturdy (my three-year-old keeps getting hold of them but they haven't broken yet!) and the multi-pack makes things easy--I keep a pair at work, a pair on the nightstand, a pair in the living room, a pair in the shop, a pair at my parents' and in-laws' houses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: RGM

customer_reviews.title: Great reading glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described. Plastic framed reading glasses. The style is very neutral and simple (mens frames), with one pair of shaded/sun glasses style for outdoor reading. The frames and hinges are stiff enough that they fit well and don't seem floppy. The lenses are clear and sharp with no noted fishbowling or such. I bought the 5 pack and put a pair in all the obvious places around the house (den, bedroom, kitchen, Bible bag) and they are perfect for that. If I lose, break, or otherwise need more reading glasses, I will likely purchase this set again.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable-Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable-long lasting. These reading glasses are long lasting and durable, unlike many competitive brands that last a few werks or so. They go on forever it seems without breaking. This is the most important element that I appreciate in a pair of reading glasses. They fit good, as well or better than many other brands of reading glasses that I've tried. I can get them in the higher power that suits me, and they are accurate in their design/craftmanship. It's good to finally have found a reliable source for good reading glasses.
customer_reviews.author: UncleRemus

customer_reviews.title: Great Readers
customer_reviews.text: I had lens replacement ten years ago and I have to use readers to read and work on the computer. I'm hard on readers and I've had to often replace my readers. I've tried all kinds of readers but I found the Eyekepper Spring Hinges Vintage Reading Glasses +1.25 to be comfortable to wear and of high quality. The Eyekepper 5-Pack readers were a lucky find. I hope they don't raise the price because of my review.
customer_reviews.author: Master Gunny

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like. 5 pair for 15 to 18 bucks - can't beat that. Good looking. Fits well. Dislike. The lens scratch pretty easily, so one has to be careful. The frames have a tendency to break in the exact same spot on the left side - although they last a good amount of time before breaking. The dislikes are more than compensated for with the low price. I've bought these many times over the years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Folk

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable (and they look good too)
customer_reviews.text: VERY good value. Been using these for over a year now, at work, in the car, at home. I stuff them in my pockets, drop them, wash them, toss them on the bed or my desk, and after all that they're still in great shape. The spring hinges are still tight and there are ZERO scratches on the lenses. The tinted ones are amazing for sitting out in the sun reading. The clear ones have been great for using the computer, reading, or doing fine work on models and miniatures. Pros: extremely durable, comfortable, great price, plus they actually look good Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Truly a bargain. Just received my second order.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed enough with the first set that I ordered a second in a stronger magnification. I will likely order a third. It would be pretty hard to beat these for the money. Lenses are clear with no significant or even noticeable distortions. The spring action arms are very helpful. For budget readers I definitely recommend and I will purchase more in a stronger strength.
customer_reviews.author: Rez

customer_reviews.title: as described in appearance
customer_reviews.text: These Men's Vintage Reading Glasses Reading Glasses by Eyekepper are exactly as described in appearance, functionality, purpose, and quality. The frames are flexible soft plastic making them light and comfortable. I keep varying degrees of readers in the house for one reason or another and the magnification seems to be spot on. I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Huffman

customer_reviews.title: garbage.. poor quality
customer_reviews.text: garbage.. poor quality. Don't buy they are not good quality readers. They did not last long.. I purchased in Jan and now in April I frame is broken and lens came off. Hinge is broken on another pair. poor quality readers - waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M Asim qamar

customer_reviews.title: Good for multiple sets around the house, but not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've order two sets of these to use as reading glasses. I like having a pair in every room of the house so they're always handy. They are comfortable and serve their purpose, but I've had two pair break and lose their lens within the first 9 months of using them. I think they are great for the price, much cheaper than you can buy in any store, but keep in mind you get what you pay for. At this price you can consider them throwaways.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnified As Expected but Smudge Easily
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I am new to reading glasses so I don't have alot to compare to. The glasses made my reading much clearer and were far cheaper than buying at an optician. The only minor annoyance is that the lenses seem thick compared to other reading glasses I have seen. They also smudge quite easily with finger prints and seem difficult to clean once a print is on them. However, for the cost I really can't complain. They do what I need and I have more than enough to spread around so I don't lose them.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay...a while back ago, I purchased glasses from a bg box store. They were okay. Not the best quality, which I was surprised. That being said, I was hesitant to buy these. Wow...got them and super happy. Comfortable and appeared to be built well! Have used them for about a week and I am happy. They feel so good and I would tell ya to get them if you stw on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Guarino

customer_reviews.title: Very rugged glasses
customer_reviews.text: I go through reader glasses like water if I buy them at one of the local drug stores that usually last about 2 weeks these that I bought from Amazon a 5-pack at a reasonable price I still have all five that I bought in February and I decided to buy another five pack as a gift for a friend I have never seen such durable reader in any of the drug stores from which I have purchased them before PS I have a habit of watching TV in bed and falling asleep waking up in the morning still wearing my eyeglasses and they still don't break
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B. Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I wear reading glasses constantly throughout the day. I have them ALL OVER my house and office. I've bought pairs that cost $32.99 each and I've also bought some from the Dollar Store. This 5-pack is great! Includes one pair for use outside when I'm reading on the patio. Great quality. The earpiece is attached with the spring loaded hinge. Definitely worth the money for 5 pair!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic glasses at $3 a pair.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for 4 months now and have lost one pair and broken none (two are still in the package waiting to be usued). The optics are superior to any reading glasses bought in drug stores including Foster Grants at $22/pair. These are comfortable, lightweight, and to disagree with other reviews, very sturdy. I know sturdy. No other reading glasses I have bought have lasted as long as these. When i finally lose these or wear them out I will be reordering. Bottom line: fantastic product at $3/pair.
customer_reviews.author: medmark

customer_reviews.title: I have probably bought 50 pairs of these because of the cost. I'll continue to buy them
customer_reviews.text: Hey you're getting a few pairs of glasses for what one pair would cost at CVS. I have bought these on multiple occasions. I'm given the quality three stars because they will scratch if you don't be careful with them and I always have a problem with one of the arms coming off. I'm pretty hard on glasses so that doesn't bother me too much or else I wouldn't keep buying them. They're good-looking reading glasses. I'll continue to buy them for the price they offer.
customer_reviews.author: Benton E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shades 1.25 Tinted
customer_reviews.text: Not often I write a review but these glasses are nice. A darker tint than appears in the photo but that's ok with me. These are actually quite stylish and in my opinion a great look. The most impressive part though is the magnification of the lens, it's consistent. I find with the cheaper ones you normally get one little area in the center that's the correct magnification then it's gets blurry and changes towards the outside edges of the lenses, and is very distracting when your eyes drift off center and even causes headaches, not these, these are actually pretty darn good at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Martin

customer_reviews.title: Look good, till they scratch
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the plastic lenses are far to soft to be used daily. Even light cleaning with just dust will scratch these lenses. Yet the almost exact set I purchased last year from another supplier are much tougher lenses and have little to no ware. Of the 5 pair, I've had to throw away 3 in less than 1 month. Seeking better made, harder lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Kassey

customer_reviews.title: Fit my big head
customer_reviews.text: I have a very wide head and finding glasses that fit is difficult. These fit perfectly and look good. The lenses on one pair scratched more easily than I thought they should, the tortoiseshell bubbled strangely, and one pair broke early. BUT I still think these are a good deal, and I will buy them again in black or fade.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good reading glasses. Sturdy frame. Decent hinges.
customer_reviews.text: These work fine for reading glasses. I like to buy reading glasses in bulk so I can leave them in my cars and around the house. I usually buy inexpensive ones like these so I don't have to care if I lose or break them. Of all of the inexpensive reading glasses I've bought over the years these are the best as the frames/hinges are very durable. Will buy these again in the future if/when I need more.
customer_reviews.author: whocares

customer_reviews.title: Finally - Cheap readers that don't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried cheap dollar store readers and had to spring for expensive ones at the drug store in a pinch. These are the perfect price between quality (quality is fine), function (also fine) and price. I've definitely paid more for worse quality readers than these. My next step is to buy more and start storing back-up readers around the house. If you are a stickler for both value and quality like I am and value function over vanity I don't think you can go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently needed "cheaters," and these exceeded my expectations. I've been throwing them around, sticking them in pockets and generally not being nice to them and they are all still unbroken. They are comfortable, easily slide and stay at all points on my nose and don't look terrible. The big plus is that i'm reading again! Hooray for me!
customer_reviews.author: BillG

customer_reviews.title: For the price? You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I read many of the reviews, and was not optimistic. I have a large head (wear a 7 1/2 hat), and was afraid the quality whined about. I received them today, and while the packaging *was* cheaply done, the glasses themselves I am VERY happy with. All 5 pair are of the same good quality, and even with the big head, fit. I would have happily paid twice the amount for these.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Received them one hour ago
customer_reviews.text: Last week I bought my very first pair of readers :-( I paid $22 at Target. They are very blurry. I saw this and thought "what a price!" After one hour of trying each of them on I can say they are 1) comfortable, 2) stylish, 3) very clear. We'll see what happens in the weeks and months ahead, but they get 5 stars for initial quality. Update: 4 months in, still in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Goulee`

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cheap plastic pieces of garbage. In 7 months all 5 of the glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap plastic pieces of garbage. In 7 months all 5 of the glasses have broken frames. The frame around the lens breaks ridiculously easy. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe they are this good!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the reviewer that the lenses are as good as Foster Grant's. I have been buying readers from the dollar store. I didn't realize how much better it could be by spending $1 more per pair. These are great readers! Are there better one's out there? Yep, but at 25x the price. If you are like me who constantly breaks and loses their readers, these are the best I have found, bar none. At this price, they are no brainers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend,  great quality
customer_reviews.text: So much better then any drug store quality glasses. The price point and quality if far superior then any I have purchased over the years, my husband has easily broke many, many drugstore plastic frames in the past. These are sturdy and have real glass in them not some sort of plastic lenses. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Born

customer_reviews.title: Will Break - Waiting for Warranty Information
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them because they are inexpensive. They are also cheap. Every pair has eventually broken in the exact same place on the top of the frame. Their product description says they have a warranty but their doesn't appear to be a way to contact the manufacturer. Still, they get two stars instead of one because they are inexpensive. I would give them 4-5 stars if the manufacturer provided contact information and stood behind the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Isn't Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to spread around so I could have a pair whenever needed. I was pleased at first with them until I realized all but one pair had loose frames. I can probably buy a small screwdriver and tighten them up but they should have arrived without needing work. I have to say if not for this problem I would go 4 - 5 stars but this is poor quality control.
customer_reviews.author: lpmitchell76

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: I refuse to pay a lot for reading glasses, and for awhile I was just buying Dollar Tree glasses. I bought a $10 pair from Walmart once, but they broke after several months. There's are great; the Dollar Tree glasses can have bad optics, but these glasses are crystal clear, even better than the $10 Walmart pair, but these are less than $3 each when you average the cost. Decent sturdy frames with spring-loaded hinges, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sloane

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are comfortable , they do the job and are a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these glasses that I purchased. they have hinges that are designed to spring out a little so they don't slide down your nose . They are as comfortable as my prescription glasses and I don't have to worry if I loose a pair. great design and money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: WOLFY

customer_reviews.title: I like the looks of these even more than my more expensive name brand frames!
customer_reviews.text: I lose readers like it's my job! I recently purchased this mulitpack in frustration for never having a pair of glasses when I need them. I really LOVE the look and feel of these and I find myself reaching for them rather than my more expensive name brand options. I'm wearing a pair right now (two toned black/clear). I ordered them .25 less than I use for regular reading, for use with my work computer (full size monitor) and they are perfect for that. I can still read up close with them but at .25 less (1.75 rather than 2.0) it makes the text out about 15 -18 inches appear crisp.
customer_reviews.author: HonestOmnivore

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Buying items like this is never easy for me. I like to get my hands on it first. But, I took the chance and I am very happy I did. I had 1 pair and it was never where I wanted it. Now I have several pairs so I have one on my nightstand, one at my computer, one at my coffee table. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Priced right
customer_reviews.text: To soon to rate sturdiness all other catagories get a 5 the biggest problem I have seen in spring loaded ear arms is the tiny flat piece of metal pinched in the frame is the question Others i have had 1 year then the arms fall off fixable but only for short periods x"Will see"
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the rims are a bit too small; they are still in my peripheral vision which only becomes a bother after more than 2 hours or so of constant wear. I really like the bridge being a single piece; there are no nose pads or pad arms to constantly readjust. Another nice feature is the hinges are flexible, making a comfortable fit for my big, fat head and making them a bit more durable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: PinkieWasHere

customer_reviews.title: Great readers!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price for fantastic set of specs. I used to have the foster-grant e-readers, and hated them due to distortion. These new specs are really easy to use, and they do exactly what I want with very little distortion. The fact that I can get 5 pairs for such a low cost is amazing. There's not a ton to them, and they work great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Product has Slipped
customer_reviews.text: The readers in my last order are inferior to earlier purchases from this seller. So far three pair from this five pair order have broken. The rim around the lens in each case. I have used reading glasses for more than 30 years so I know how to handle them properly. I won't buy any more from this seller until there is some indication they have resolved this quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: stephen a. ernst

customer_reviews.title: Snapped broken after a few days :( .
customer_reviews.text: Snapped while reading news online. Wow I really love the style of these they are light, stylish and comfortable. They snapped while on my face reading the news. Fortunately they come n a 5 pack. I will have to do without my favorite pair. I really don,t want to return them because I love the style. I'm a normal size person with a normal size face .It was shocking to hear this pop while they were on my face. Maybe I received one bad apple out of the bunch. I will use the others to see if I have the same problem.Hopefully not I really really love these glasses.I will update if I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG BELL

customer_reviews.title: I’d give these 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My husband loves them and with so many I even kept a pair. The arms seem to be spring loaded. They are very light but feel like they will last, not flimsy at all. I have the foster grants I bought at Costco and these are definitely lighter and more comfortable. Plus I got 5 for the same price I purchased 3 at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice Readers
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice basic readers. The price is amazing, and having so many means I can leave them lay all over the place and will probably be able to find a pair when I need them. The hinges seem pretty hefty, and the lenses seem to be of good quality. They're comfortable. What else could you want?
customer_reviews.author: DianeH

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED- I BOUGHT MORE!Wow. I cannot believe how good these are for this price- for FIVE
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy $15 readers at my pharmacy when I go in. These are just as good or better and you get 5 for the same or less price! I really like the tortoise shell ones, but they are all good looking. I bought the set of 5 different styles. Each even have a satin bag to keep them in. Five glasses, five bags.
customer_reviews.author: TechandGadgetMan

customer_reviews.title: They'll break...
customer_reviews.text: The last pair in this batch just broke yesterday. Now all of the five have broken and very single pair broke in exactly the same spot (see pic)- right where the top of the frame above the lens joins the nose bridge. I don't have a large head, so they weren't stretched. Otherwise they fit well and were stylish enough. I was most worried about the hinges, but they held up well. The breakage is due to the really cheap plastic that these are made of which don't stand up to the typlical twisting motion as you remove the glasses. At least I didn't pay much. I suppose that $25 for an annual "subscription" for reading glasses is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: B. Metz

customer_reviews.title: Frames will break in the same place
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Lenses are sharp and clear, relatively light weight, price is cheap CONS: Frames do not last with everyday use. Frames break in the same place on both sides. This product might be worth the cost if Amazon sold them by the hundred lot at the same price as five.
customer_reviews.author: Len S

customer_reviews.title: words getting fuzzy?  buy these
customer_reviews.text: excellent reading glasses. well made. really, very well made. sturdy and long lasting. and such a boost for reading. when you get older and you can't see the dates on pennies anymore, you go to cvs and buy cheap reading glasses. you buy cheap ones because you know you're going to sit on them and break them. but you can't find glasses stronger than 350. these glasses do the job. they're so well made and serviceable, I can't believe how inexpensive they are. not just recommended....highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kjpc

customer_reviews.title: Whoever desined these must have needed readers to start with!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, lightweight, VERY durable, and a pleasure to wer! The fact that they come in their separate little cloth bags shows thoughtfulness and wanting my business. Probably one of the best buys I have ever made, and I will keep on buying them, as this is my second order! Thanks for some really great readers!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding seller
customer_reviews.text: I had purchase these glasses and within a year two of them broke. I contacted the seller and they gave me an option to replace them or a refund . I opted for replacement. They are decent glasses at this price point. The seller stands by his product. They are terrific and second to none.
customer_reviews.author: gerardo gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are made much more sturdy than most others. Comfort is very good but can not adjust nose pieces to sit at tip of nose. The arms have a nice spring to stretch outward. I have to say that I'm used to walmart and drug store glasses and the first thing I noticed was that these glasses clarity and quality was much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnyboy John

customer_reviews.title: Bought a set and then re-ordered more!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. They look great on him and are quality glasses. Darker on top and tortoise on bottom. Seem lightweight but good quality. He tends to "lose" his glasses so after we had these a few weeks, I went on and bought another set as backups. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rockhellee

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Hey these are really a great deal. Who cares after two or three months if you break them. It's certainly cheap enough. And if you don't sit on them or mistreat them they will last. They even come with a little satchel that you could put them in. I think these are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: They are quite good...for a 5-pack that costs $13.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are quite good considering I got 5 pairs for $13. Better build quality than, and similar lens quality, to the Costco readers I have. Like most cheap glasses though glare can be an issue sometimes if there are bright lights. I'll probably pay more for better lenses next time, but I don't regret this purchase at all. They are very sturdy and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: pseudosavant

customer_reviews.title: Pretty close to perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: They say men’s but I’m wearing them and they look and feel wonderful! Sturdy, spring hinges, My only drawbacks are that the variety could be a bit better (but they are men’s so I get that) as well as them getting dirty so easily. But I understand that these are only meant for readers and I wear them for my day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Mireles-Carriere

customer_reviews.title: Defective Manufacturing, and poos aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: The left handle is lose on all six pairs, where it connects to the front of the glasses. I have tried tightening it with a small professional screwdriver. But it will not tighten. Bad manufacturing, and bad QA. There are also two chrome pins on each side of the front of the glasses, which give it a more industrial look, and not very elegant appearance. I will use them when woodworking in the garage, but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Shahijanian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving them 2 stars just because they fit comfortably. The lenses are terrible. You must look straight ahead at all times because there are distortions for more than 1/4 inch from the outside of the frame. Some of them even distort at the bottom right corner. To add insult to injury, THEY ARE NON-RETURNABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Mordolo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses set of (5) readers in June and had no problems of them falling apart or screws backing out. They are very well made because they are still holding together and the price you cannot beat for the number of readers you get, that is awesome. I am wearing one now writing this review. The readers look good on my face and fit nice and firm. Buy these you cannot go wrong for the price. I have bought Costco and Walmart readers and they will not even last me a month without screws backing out and lenses falling out, cheaply made. Do yourself a favor and buy these...
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: No complaints - good value
customer_reviews.text: These readers are a good value, work well, and are comfortable to wear. A nice set if you are looking for a little variety (not a lot) so that you can leave a pair in a few different places. The set comes will a soft case for each pair.
customer_reviews.author: truman

customer_reviews.title: Mix up in box... Not what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Originally was very happy with them but when I took the second pair out to use elsewhere in the house saw that had two different strengths in the same box!!!... Didn’t get what I paid for: ordered 3x strength and got 1.25 strength— thought I was going blind
customer_reviews.author: Worker

customer_reviews.title: One Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Five stars is much deserved with these solid styled, durable, and comfortable-fit specs. I've been on my first pair, dropped quite a few times, and honestly haven't experienced the "frame cracks" that I read about on previous reviews. Best part? I have four extra pairs, all which came with individual sleek pouches, in storage. ((The first pair I chose are still the same quality as when I first purchased.)) Helpful Tip: These are great for BOOK/ARTICLE reading. Highly recommend getting reading glasses with the Blue Light protection. Protect you eyes when you're staring at screens or technology all day friends.
customer_reviews.author: Zacharias_Graduate

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses. I like that you get a few as I am very good a losing things. I would buy again but lets be honest here, you get five in the pack if you've lost all 5 your problem isn't your vision. It might be time to look for some memory supplements =)
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these reading glasses. Feel sturdy yet light weight and comfortable. I can be a bit rough on my glasses and so far no issues with the frame or lenses. Lenses are clear I don't see any waves or lens discoloration. Best of all 5 pairs for under $15 and each came with its own little cloth bag with a draw string for storage, now that's a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: RaD raDsTEr

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back.
customer_reviews.text: I think reading glasses go the way of the lost sock in the dryer. Where the heck do they go? I buy a set of these about every six months because at month 5 two of us are always sharing one set of glasses. In all the years I have bought these I have had one arm break off, and we're easily talking 30 pair of glasses. Totally worth it. I love the choices of styles and colors and we finally settled on the black frames only (we have three of the sunglasses and they work great too)
customer_reviews.author: Yet another Whitney

customer_reviews.title: So far 80 percent of the set of five "Good"
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I wore had a unspring hinge. The second pair, I am presently wearing daily, is hold up fairly well. I am babying the hell out of the rest based on the defect found in the first pair. Hope the first was just a fluke. I would hate to think who ever is packaging this product is not inspecting for quality prior to shipping to his customers. I will probably come back to this company again if the rest of the batch holds up.... So far they can only achieve a grade of "B-".due to quality of one landfill item found in the set I received. Thanks Eyekeepers. :)
customer_reviews.author: SoundSpongeTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE WORST CR@P I HAVE EVER BOUGHT IN AMAZON.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE WORST CR@P I HAVE EVER BOUGHT IN AMAZON. I ordered 2.0 Reading glasses ... this things are worst than being blind. Worthless completely And YOU CANNOT RETURN THEM ???? WHAT KIND OF CRAPY SERVICE THIS IS
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Marco Villatoro

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These glasses gave me a headache after only a few minutes. I also noticed considerable distortion in the peripheral views. Unfortunately, and for no reason that I can see in their return rules, Amazon will not let me return them. Luckily, they're cheap.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Owen

customer_reviews.title: An Update  BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: A while back I gave these glasses 5 stars, and they deserved it. However, the second lot of glasses I received (ordered May 2015) are of noticeably lower quality, with the glasses scratching more than the first lot, and the legs coming off from three glasses so far, with hardly any wear. It unfortunately looks like a typical case of grabbing custumers with a fine product then cheaping the quality control. It really is too bad, for these were the best reading glasses ive ever owned for the price. The sad fact is that even with the legs coming off, they may still be worth to buy. Just buy replacemente screws and or, tighten the screws every so often..
customer_reviews.author: cloudance

customer_reviews.title: Weaker magnification; can't return...
customer_reviews.text: i've been wearing 2.0 from CostCo for a couple years, but wanted to try another style/brand. bought the 2.0 glasses here but there were not as strong. ordered the 2.25 which feel like the 2.0 magnification from CostCo, but now i can't return the first order. take your chances with the magnification. i still like the style, comfort, weight, etc. can't speak to the scratch resistance yet because they're brand new. good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Blandford

customer_reviews.title: Best Readers for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The lens on these are crystal clear. Lenses on my other readers were always getting foggy or seemed to scratch easily. Getting 5 pairs at such a low price is insane. These glasses are better than my FGs that I paid $20 for. I should probably get another 5 before the price goes up. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality Problems Galore...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these before, they were awesome. NOW THEY SUCK. How can you have 2 different defects, in 5 pairs of glasses? 1) one pair - no glue in the lenses. I picked up the glasses, and the lenses fell out. Huh?. 2) another pair - the lenses are non-corrective! They gave me clear lenses they are supposed to be readers with corrective lenses! So, idiots who own this company, apparently you changed manufacturing vendors. Change back to the other one. Your new one is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Lott

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Standard reading (non-prescription) glasses are good but easy to misplace or break. having spares is always nice. These are sturdy, fit well, and do the job. To my surprise they even brought one set of tinted glasses which work surprisingly well. Better and cheaper than the ones you get at the pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexf

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these twice. I can't read without reading glasses, so I have to have a pair handy everywhere I go. These are so affordable only a couple bucks a pair and they are as nice as the $15 pair you will find at the drug store. They are higher quality than other discount readers. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: jason anderson

customer_reviews.title: Best Readers I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've bought plenty of cheap readers from the dollar store and drug store, and they hardly last a month. I'm still on my first pair, and they've lasted 3 months and are still like new. These are absolutely worth the price! UPDATE: Going on 4 1/2 months and still on the first pair without a scratch! And I've still got 4 pair in backup!
customer_reviews.author: John Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These work great with great clear lenses. They look good and feel good. A little heavy but you get used to it. I have not had any problems yet with them falling apart. Having five pairs make it easy to find one all over my house and in my car. You can't beat the price for the quality. They work a lot better then the 99 cent store glasses, and are not much more expensive, they are worth it so far. They seem as good as the ones you buy from the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Malis

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: You get several good reading glasses for a good price. My husband either has a history of losing them or need them and have to go to another room to fetch them. He is happy now, he has a pair in every room and a pair in my purse for reading menus when we are out and about.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hagelstien

customer_reviews.title: Great i can see again,Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: They are great and the price us fantastic,The only thing is something happened while ordering them because i had asked for bifocals and did not get them but i had to have then to read an could not send them back but other wise they are great i can see to read again,Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Blanscet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They have their own little velvet keepers so they don’t get scratched in your purse. They are my favorites out of all the ones I’ve bought. Will buy again. Because let’s face it. I will lose them all in a few months. These are awesome and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Judy Robertson

customer_reviews.title: OK as disposable
customer_reviews.text: These readers are fairly comfortable and they stay on my face well. The optics don't work as well as others I've used so, I probably wouldn't buy them again. They're OK if you just want a few pairs scattered around for ready access and limited use.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty 1

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses great price
customer_reviews.text: These are inexpensive readers. Very sturdy. They look nice on. They have hinges so that’s make them sturdy not like the ones I was getting at the $ store. I always buy more because in my family we share the pack and eventually they get lost or sat on🤣
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Flea Market Quality Junk
customer_reviews.text: The first set of these I ordered a year or so back were fine, these are very noisy and creak and pop when you put them on and take them off, and the lenses do not seem to be fitted to the frames well at all. These are Flea market quality, AT BEST! Wouldn't recommend and won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, function not so nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband refuses to use these; they have a peculiar circular area that is the focal point of the glasses. The area around is blurry. They make him queasy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: one glasses frame is broke
customer_reviews.text: it's nice kit, looks nice quality with very decent price, we like many in a pack, so can be placed in car, coffee table, desk, bedroom, but one is broke at frame part yesterday, others are still good, we will see, i will keep in post.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette G

customer_reviews.title: They work for women too!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses, simple and classy. I am actually female but like these a lot better than the "girly" ones, they look better and they are more comfortable. Additionally, my husband and I both use them so it is easier to just have these. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LOLITA

product_meta.title: Eyekepper Mens Vintage Reading Glasses-5 Pack Include Reading Sunglasses for Men Outdoor Reading,Reader Eyeglasses Women
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :7.1 x 3.1 x 2.2 inches; 3.35 Ounces
 * Item model number :No Model
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :July 5, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Eyekepper
 * ASIN :B00LJOQM26

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,210 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household)  *  #6 inReading Glasses 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars9,568 ratings
feature_bullets: Standard Frame : Registered reading glasses and eyewear, accord with ANSI Z80.3-2010, accord with BS EN ISO 12312-1:2013 and EN14139:2010, accord with AS/NZS 1067:2009. Made of top standard plastic frame, lenses and have spring-loaded hinges

Optical Performance : The pupil distance(PD) is 59-63mm, the deviation for pupil distance(PD) is less than 2mm, the deviation for strength is less than 0.02 and the deviation for lenses horizontal line is less than 1mm

Reading Glasses : The 5 pack set comes in 1 power of your choice. These are not mixed powers. Tinted lenses are great for outdoor reading. Classic-shaped frames looks good on any face. Spring-hinged temples help glasses fit to your face

Product Dimensions : Frame material: plastic, Lens width: 2" (51mm), Frame width: 5 5/16" (135mm), Lens height: 1 1/4" (32mm), Frame height: 1 7/16" (37mm), Bridge (DBL): 1/2"(13mm), Temple length: 5 7/16" (138mm), Spring hinge: Yes, Lenses: Aspheric, Head size: Narrow to Medium. -able frame

Comfortable Eyewear : The frame is comfortable to wear and the lenses light transmittance is very good. Besides, casual frame design keeps you looks professional and fashionable while working or reading. Suitable for different face types. Perfect gift for your friends, parents, grandparents and relatives
